FESI.gui
Interface InterpreterCommands

All Known Implementing Classes:
Interpret
public interface InterpreterCommands

Define the interface to the commands of the interpreter which can be called by the gui

executeString

public int executeString(String text,
                         String source)
Execute a string - return the line number of any error or 0
Parameters:
text - The text to execute
source - The identification of the source
Returns:
the line number of any error if possible or 0
